titleStmt.title: London's choice of citizens to represent them in the ensuing parliament viz. Sir Robert Clayton, Lord Mayor elect, Sir Thomas Player, Knight, William Love and Thomas Pilkington, Esquires : with an account of some passages previous thereto and remarques upon the whole, October 7th, 1679 / in a private letter from E.E. to J.W. at Newcastle upon Tine.
titleStmt.author: E. E.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University Library.
